channel.title: *--=Attention Mods Read This =--*
channel.description:
Ok this will answer all noobs answers for servers if you want to log on to a server go to the top of your Moparscape Client And select File once selected the first button click on it and press NEW SERVER then once this is been done it will show a place to put your server url and if you need a server url go to [url=http://moparisthebest.com]http://moparisthebest.com[/url] i hope that answers your questions on how to get on to a server.
CAN A MOD PIN THIS PLEASE :P
But hardly anyone reads that sticky lol
